urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @AnishaP47192574 Hi Anisha, please be advised that you can use the baggage reference number to search for your baggage online at https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH. You need to select "To the baggage status website".
@rutugo5 Hi Rutuja, please be advised we have replied to your message sent via direct message. Kind regards, Vernon.
@traintheteacher Hi Stephanie, Send it via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.
@traintheteacher Hi Stephanie, Kindly ask if you could provide your booking code or ticket number, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.

@MT82612810 Hi@mt82612810, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised that you will have to trace your baggage via the link https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq, so that you may be updated on any new findings concerning your baggage. Kind regards, Noah.

@reisetopia Guten Tag, Reisetopia. Da unsere Flugzeuge in der Schweiz immatrikuliert sind, gilt die Schweizer Gesetzgebung. An Bord halten wir uns an den Empfehlungen des BAG: https://t.co/8m2J3l4JyG, Ute

@HerrMiM @Kurt_cLunte @SBahnBerlin Guten Morgen, Herr MiM. Bitte entschuldige die späte Antwort. Es tut uns leid, da wegen vielen Anfragen unsere Service Kanäle eine Weile lang überfoerdert waren. Auf den sozialen Medien sind wir gerne für jederlei Anfragen da. Viele Grüsse, Ute

@MT82612810 Hi@mt82612810, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that you will have to directly contact the Lost and Found Department in Heathrow, so that they may assist you with your baggage. Kind regards, Noah.
@emkazwei Hi@emkazwei, Please be advised that there is no strike in Germany or Switzerland for SWISS. Kind regards, Noah.
@enidhi Hi Shrinidhi, Kindly ask if you can provide your booking code or ticket number via direct message, so that we may clarify your issue. Kind regards, Noah.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @lauradeornelas Hi Laura, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that you will have to contact the Lost and Found Department at Heathrow Airport so that they may assist you further with your baggage. Kind regards, Noah.
@Manasi43837193 Hi Manasi, Please be advised that I have replied to your direct message. Kind regards, Noah.
@Manasi43837193 Hi Manasi, I sincerely apologize for the late reply and for what happened to your baggage. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

@AnishaP47192574 Hi Anisha, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. We kindly ask if you have received a delayed baggage reference number? Kind regards, Noah.
@Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.
@Naimah__a Hi, we have just responded to you via private message/
@uloeffler If so, can please provide me with the case reference number via private message so that I can send a follow up request to the relevant department to assist you further?
@uloeffler Hi, thank you for your message and sorry for the inconvenience caused. Since you have already filled the form online, did you receive any case reference number?
@skyoverzurich Hi, thank you for your support. Wishing you all the best and a pleasant day ahead. We look forward to welcome you on board SWISS again.
@mrshobutt Hi, we have just responded to you via private message.
@rutugo5 Hi, I have just responded to you via private message.

@Manvith19696208 @rutugo5 Hi, thank you for your response. We shall assess the case and get back to the passenger directly. Should you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to send us a private message.
@rutugo5 Hi, we have just responded to you via private message.

@MT82612810 Hi, my sincerest apologies for the delayed response and for any inconvenience caused due to delayed baggage. Have you filed for a missing baggage with the Lost and found desk of your arrival airport?
@itsxmypurpose Hi, we have just responded to you via private message.

@Supernetworks Hi, I am truly sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us thus far and I sincerely apologize. I am glad that you have received your baggage. Please do not hesitate to send us a private message should there be any further queries.

@RicGRuffolo Further to this, you will need to get in contact with the Lost and Found office of your arrival airport as they will be the best department that will be able to provide you an update regarding your baggage. Kind Regards, Sam.

@RicGRuffolo Hi Riccardo, thanks for your message and apologies for the late response. We regret that your baggage was lost during transportation with SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience experienced in this regard. We kindly ask that you continue to check on the website for any updates.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @ravichoyal26 Moreover, regarding your flights, as this is a past flight query, you may fill a complaint form via the link: https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI and our colleagues who handles past flight queries will assess your complaint and advise you accordingly.
@ravichoyal26 You can also send me the case reference number so that I can send a follow up to the relevant team to check your case once again.

@ravichoyal26 Please be advised that if you are not satisfied with the response from the Customer Feedback regarding your delayed baggage, then you may reply to the email to have your case re-evaluated.
@ravichoyal26 Hi, I am truly sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us thus far and I sincerely apologize.
@DupontIsland Hi, we have just responded to you via private message.
@Clarky_2012 Hi, sorry for the late reply and for the inconvenience caused. Can you please send me your booking reference via private message, so I may assist you further?
@whatisbestnow Hi, Goodmorning. Wishing you all the best and a great day ahead 😊
@BestTLD Hi, Goodmorning. Have a wonderful day ahead. Take care and stay safe😊
@orestistzo You're welcome. I am glad that you have enjoyed the services provided on our flight. Wishing you all the best and a pleasant day ahead.

@rutugo5 Hi Rutuja, please be advised the relevant department will respond accordingly to the email. Due to the high volume of incoming requests and queries, handling time maybe delayed. Your patience and understanding during this challenging time is appreciated. Kind regards, Sana.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @PascalSahli Hi Pascal, cannot wait to welcome you on board. Kind regards, Angie.
@johnjs8400 Hi John, kindly provide us with your case reference via private message so we can assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.

@advnaresh Once the form has been successfully submitted, you will receive a case reference number in your email where you may follow up to send your receipts for the expenses made in order for our customer feedback team to assist you accordingly. Kind regards,Angie.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @advnaresh Hi Naresh, For compensation regarding your expenses towards your lost baggage you are kindly requested to fill out the form online via the link: https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx.

data.text:
The feeling of being at home around the world, the feeling of being reminded of your roots, wherever you go, the feeling of boundless possibilities – this is SWISS.✈️🎥 

Watch our new short film which marks the 20th anniversary of SWISS on YouTube now:
@joaquinspotter @jgagnot @jqfotoyvideo @zombideferro @nramirez36 @Joacorobertt @isma_bfbi @bezzer_spotter @SpottersArg @ns_spotter Prezado Joaquinspotter você poderia me dizer qual seria sua pergunta

@oksana33205479 Hi Oksana, Therefore, we recommend you to contact the SWISS cargo department for the transportation of your baggage. You may use the contact details below to get in contact with the cargo department:
 https://t.co/YgtzvCD3yD. Kind regards, Angie.
@schmalzamalz @flyedelweiss @zrh_airport Vielen Dank für dein tolles Feedback, wir schätzen das sehr! Wir können kaum warten dir am Bord wieder zu begrüssen! Liebe Grüsse, Claire
@Rachasss Hi Rachel, kindly provide us the case reference number so we can send a follow up, once we have an update we will get back to you. Kind regards, Angie.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @DenysVitali Hi Denys, we are so sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us and we apologize. However, if you would like to file a formal complaint, you may do so via the following link. https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx. Kind regards, Angie.
@itsxmypurpose Hi Mathilde, kindly provide me with your booking reference so I can assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.
@0xBS0D Please refer to your direct messages.
@0xBS0D Hi Dean, thank you for your message. We have responded to you via direct message. Kind regards, Vernon.

@Romain_Astier_ Hi Romain, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Can you please provide your booking code or ticket number via direct message, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.

@oksana33205479 Hi Oksana, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we will have to refer you back to the airport you last arrived at, as they will be able to assist you further with your request. Kind regards, Noah.

@anna_mclaughl Hi Anna, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that the search for your baggage still continues. You will be notified via email once your baggage has been found. Kind regards, Noah.
@Bel1205 Hi Belinda, please be advised that you will contact your airport of arrival. They will be able to advise the location and status of the bag. Kind regards, Vernon.

@amostalmor Hi Amos, Thank you for your message. I kindly advise that if you want to change your seats, you will have to do so at the airport. In addition, due to security reasons, I ask if you can remove your booking code from the public platform. Kind regards, Noah.
@RicGRuffolo H Riccardo, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

@Bel1205 Hi Belinda, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I kindly ask if you have contacted the lost and found department at the airport you last arrived at? Kind regards, Noah.

@Alien10110 Hi@alien10110, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Kindly ask if you can provide your baggage reference number via direct message, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.

@WillRowan5 Hi Will, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that, due to security reasons, I kindly ask to remove your booking details from the public platform. Kind regards, Noah.
@AlanGreenwood_ Hi Alan, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised, we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.
@ilarihenrik Hi Ilari, thank you for the update. Have a great day further. Kind regards, Vernon.
@ravichoyal26 Hi Ravindra, for security reasons, we kindly request you to delete your booking details from your public post and send us a direct message. Kind regards, Flora.
@Alien10110 Hi Alien101, apologies for the inconvenience. Have you reported the lost bag to the lost and found office at your arrival airport? Kind regards, Flora.
@javed_vora Hi Mohamed, please be advised that we have responded to your direct message. Kind regards, Flora.
@mgsavla Hi SpiderWeb, please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via direct message in order for me us to assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Flora.

@DupontIsland Hi Dupont, please be advised that you will need to report the delayed bag to the lost and found department at your arrival airport. They will assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Flora.

@Cavin9p7d7ptw4p Hi Isabel, apologies for the inconvenience. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via direct message in order for us to assist you further. Kind regards, Flora.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @lisibo Once you have reported the missing bag, you will be provided with a reference number. You can use this reference number to track the bag online on the baggage tracer that is available on the right side of the page on the link: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH. Kind regards, Flora.

@lisibo Hi Lisibo, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. If you did not receive your bag after your flight, we kindly request you to lodge a missing baggage report at the lost and found office at your arrival airport. Kind regards, Flora.
@DupontIsland Hi Dupont, apologies for the delay in response. Have you received your bags? Kind regards, Flora.
@javed_vora Hi Mohamed, apologies for the inconvenience. Please be advised that we have sent you a direct message. Kind regards, Flora.

@AndrewSReiser Hi Andrew, due to security reasons we kindly request you to remove your booking details from your public post. There was a delay due to operational reasons and we do apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused. Kind regards, Flora.
@RicGRuffolo Kindly provide us with your case reference so we can send a follow up regarding your case.
@javed_vora Hi Mohamed, kindly send your booking reference via private message so we can assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.
@RicGRuffolo Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage  promptly as possible. Kind regards, Angie.

@RicGRuffolo Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

@RicGRuffolo Please be assured that we will do all possible to assist you through this experience. Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracking link below:https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq

@RicGRuffolo Hi Riccardo, We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and understand that this will be inconvenient for you.
@oksana33205479 We have sent a follow up once we get an update we will get back to you.
@HuLin08098170 Hi Hu Lin, apologies for the delay in response. Kindly provide me with your booking reference so I can assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.
@JbnJbn185 @GroupeADP Bonjour Jbn, désolé de la réponse tardive,pourrais-je avoir la réference de votre dossier en message privé afin de vous assister?  Cordialement, Elyse
@EugeneA81417655 Hi, how can I assist you? Kind regards, Angie.
@oksana33205479 Hi Oksana, how can we assist you?. Kind regards, Angie.
@Flowermariotti I have sent a follow up regarding your case reference number once we get update we will get back to you.
@AndrewSReiser Hi Andrew, kindly provide me with your booking reference. Kind regards. Angie.
@anna_mclaughl We have sent a follow up to the relevant department regarding your case reference number.
@Flowermariotti Kindly provide us with your case reference so we can send a follow up.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, For compensation regarding your expenses towards your lost baggage you are kindly requested to fill out the form online via the link: https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx.
@anna_mclaughl Kindly provide us with your case reference number so we can send a follow up to the relevant department.
@anna_mclaughl Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage  promptly as possible. Kind regards, Angie.

@anna_mclaughl Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

@anna_mclaughl Please be assured that we will do all possible to assist you through this experience. Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracking link below: https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq

@anna_mclaughl Hi Anna, We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and understand that this will be inconvenient for you.
@oksana33205479 Hi Oksana, kindly provide us with your case reference. Kind regards, Angie

@linda_maley Hi Linda, we are truly sorry to hear about your experience with us, and we apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. Please note that we taken your feedback into consideration and will work on improving on such areas to ensure customer satisfaction. Kind Regards, Sam
@ckgalton Hi Catherine, please be advised that we have responded to you via direct message. Kind Regards, Sam.
@ItsSCT Hi Shaun, thanks for mentioning us. We do hope to welcome you back on board Swiss soon. Have a great day. Kind Regards, Sam.
@whats_above_SE1 Hello, thanks for the update. Kind Regards, Sam.
